summary: This Employment Agreement dated August 18, 2025, is between Zynex, Inc. and Vikram Bajaj, who will serve as the Chief Financial Officer. Bajaj will receive a base salary of $450,000, be eligible for an annual bonus of up to 70% of his base salary, and receive equity awards valued at $2.5 million, vesting over three years, with certain accelerated vesting provisions upon termination without cause, disability, or death.
